meanings.definition: The power or capacity to do something.
meanings.sent1: Her ability to solve puzzles quickly impressed everyone.
meanings.sent2: His ability to play the piano beautifully amazed the audience.
meanings.sent3: The cat's ability to open doors led to some unexpected surprises.
meanings.sent4: His ability to see through people's lies was like having a superpower.
meanings.sent5: The child's ability to remember every detail was truly remarkable.

meanings.definition: A natural or acquired skill or talent.
meanings.sent1: His artistic ability allowed him to create stunning paintings.
meanings.sent2: She has a remarkable ability to learn new languages quickly.
meanings.sent3: The dog's ability to fetch the newspaper made it a neighborhood celebrity.
meanings.sent4: Her ability to make people laugh was like a gift from above.
meanings.sent5: The athlete's ability to jump high made him stand out in the competition.
